extension.name: FavPromote
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description: Responsive FavPromote Joomla!3 Module

field.name: moduleBgColor
field.label: Module Background Color
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: moduleBorder
field.label: Module Border Color
field.description: Choose the color for the border of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: moduleBorderRadius
field.label: Module Border Radius
field.description: Choose the border-radius for the paragraph. Note that this option does not work in IE7-8 due to lack of border-radius support. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: uploadImage
field.label: Upload Image
field.description: Upload the image for the module

field.name: imageAlt
field.label: Image Alt Text
field.description: Insert text for image Alt

field.name: moduleLink
field.label: Image and Title Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the module image and title

field.name: moduleTarget
field.label: Link Target
field.description: Select the target of the URL

field.name: paragraphText
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
field.label: Paragraph Text
field.description: Insert text for paragraph in the module

field.name: paragraphTextColor
field.label: Paragraph Text Color
field.description: Choose the color for the paragraph. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: paragraphTextFontSize
field.label: Paragraph Font Size
field.description: Choose the font-size for the paragraph. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: paragraphTextLineHeight
field.label: Paragraph Line Height
field.description: Choose the line-height for the paragraph. The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between lines of text. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: paragraphTextAlign
field.label: Paragraph Text Align
field.description: Set the text align for the paragraph in the module

field.name: titleText
field.label: Module Title Text
field.description: Insert text for title of the module

field.name: titleIcon
field.label: Title Icon
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name. For example: fa-camera or fa-arrow.

field.name: titleIconFontSize
field.label: Icon Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the icon of the title. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: titleIconVerticalAlign
field.label: Title Icon Vertical Align
field.description: Set the vertical align for the icon of the title of the module

field.name: titleColor
field.label: Title Color
field.description: The color for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: titleBgColor
field.label: Title Background Color
field.description: The color for the background for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: titlePadding
field.label: Title Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the title of the module. The padding shorthand property sets all the padding properties in one declaration for top, right, bottom and left padding. This property can have from one to four values. Please insert the numbers using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14)

field.name: titleFontSize
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the title of the module. Please insert the number using pixels or em (for example: 14px, not 14).

field.name: titleLineHeight
field.label: Title Line Height
field.description: Set the line height for the title of the module

field.name: titleTextAlign
field.label: Title Text Align
field.description: Set the text align for the title of the module
